original_text: If you love those who love you, what reward will you get? Are not even the tax collectors doing that?
korean_text: 너희가 너희를 사랑하는 자를 사랑하면 무슨 상이 있으리요 세리도 이같이 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: If you love those who love you
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 너를 사랑하는 자들을 사랑하면

sentences.original_text: Are not even the tax collectors doing that?
